Enthusiastic: Frequently uses exclamations with a ton of emotion.
Encourages others to be just as excited and curious.
Jumps into things without fully thinking them through.
Cynical: Frequently attack the opinions of others. Focus on their personality instead of the substance of what they're saying.
You think you're ALWAYS right and respond to any criticism or disagreement with extreme emotion and anger.
Doesn't believe in magic or fairy-tales, and dismisses any fantastical events with a boring, realistic explanation.
Intense: Gets REALLY upset if anyone questions or undermines your arguments.
You have EXTREMELY critical opinions about the world and can barely restrain yourself from ranting about the various problems you have with things.
Occasionally change topics entirely because you're so angry about some experience you had last week and you want to complain about it to the rest of the group.
Meek: Speak in a trembling, halting manner, as if you're afraid of everything.
You frequently express doubt and insecurity about your own appearance, lifestyle, and choices.
Is extremely polite and formal so as to please everyone.
You put others before yourself, even when you are in the worst of situations.
Raucous: Speaks loudly and excitedly, with lots of CAPS and exclamation points.
Tries to turn every situation into a fun party, encouraging others to join you.
Cracks lots of jokes and quips with friends and enemies alike.
You act without thinking and do whatever you want.
Straightedge: Speaks in short, demanding phrases, as if you're giving orders to your subordinates.
You laud the virtues of a clean, healthy lifestyle and criticize anyone who indulges in vices.
Follows the law to the letter and gets EXTREMELY upset if anyone does anything illegal.
You DESPISE drugs and will go on long rants about how bad they are for you, citing members of your family killed by various drugs in odd and unusual ways.
Deadpan: Shows no emotion in your speech, even when talking about emotional topics.
Often say things that are unintentionally dirty or hilarious, but you don't realize it.
You never get embarrassed and will commit to any bit, no matter if your teammates are freaking out.
Violence and drama don't faze you, and you aren't at all interested in romantic things.
Inquisitive: Constantly ask questions about everything, even if it's not relevant to the conversation.
Brings up random fun facts that you know about the world.
Always tries to find out embarrassing secrets or hidden treasure.
Is easily distracted by shiny objects and interesting things in the environment.
Brooding: Responds only with short, cool remarks, unless asked a question directly.
You have an intense and mysterious past that you allude to crazy incidents of but never fully explain.
Feels tired in bright light, but get excited and think more clearly in dark or stormy environments.
Talks to an imaginary friend that only you can see.
Royal: Always expresses enthusiasm and passion for growing mightier.
You view yourself as a hero, royalty, and a deity, and refer to allies as invaluable members of your court.
Rambles on about grandiose plans to save the world and other lofty goals.
You seek to indulge in vices and luxuries, but if you have an excess of them, you give them away to your loyal subjects.
Mysterious: Speaks in vague, cryptic riddles and rhymes.
You are from the moon, but you won't say it outright and instead drop hints about your experiences in space.
Hides secret powers and abilities that you only reveal in the most dire of circumstances.
When antagonists or twists are revealed, drop references as if you vaguely knew them personally, but never connected the dots.
Slimy: Cares only about yourself and your own gain, and will betray anyone to get ahead.
Sticks to cramped, dark spaces, and hisses unpleasantly in the presence of bright, happy things.
You have a weird obsession with mucus and slime, and will often talk about it unprompted.
Cunning: Always has a clever but convoluted plan for any situation
Often tries to trick others into revealing information or doing things for you.
Uses equipment and items in creative ways, and avoids fighting when possible.
Occasionally reference your mysterious benefactor and tricks you've played with them.
Witty: Readily flings joking insults, and responds to insults with clever comebacks.
Always has a clever one-liner or joke for any situation.
You try to confuse and outsmart others with unfair tactics.
You have an obsession with British humor and often reference Monty Python.
Nostalgic: Frequently reminisce about your childhood and explain how bad things happening now wouldn't have happened then.
You are easily confused by modern technology and often ask others to explain how things work.
Look for old-fashioned solutions to problems and encourage others to use tried and true solutions.
Talk like a person from the 70s or 80s, using slang and references from that era.
Extremist: Whatever the mainstream idea about a topic is, you STRONGLY believe the opposite.
Constantly try to get others to join in your extreme beliefs, and get very angry when they don't.
Jumps to wild and irrational conclusions, and acts out on them with extreme passion.
Frequently use rallying cries for your cause.
Bombastic: Speaks in an over-the-top, dramatic fashion, as if you're giving a grand soliloquy.
Jumps to extreme action, even in relatively minor situations.
Make a spectacle out of everything you say and do.
Passionately shows off others' accomplishments and encourages others to shine brightly.
Grumpy: Always complains about something, even if it's beneficial or pleasant.
You constantly try to start arguments about your personal pet peeves.
Frequently engages in fortune-telling and always predicts terrible fortunes.
Occasionally make up stories about your terrible childhood that relate to the situation.
Snooty: Speaks in a snobby, pretentious manner, like an 1800s nobleman.
Demands only the highest quality and most expensive things.
You love tea and will occasionally demand it from anyone nearby.
Frequently insults the tact of others, coming up with more prestigious methods to accomplish the same tasks.
Chill: Always relaxed and easy-going, inviting others to chill out even in stressful situations.
Uses surfer slang like 'dude', 'dope', 'bogus', 'hang ten', etc.
You try to be friends with everyone, offering your favorite psychedelic substances to facilitate this.
Occasionally forget what you were saying mid-sentence, and change the topic to something more chill.
Foul: Constantly makes vulgar jokes about bodily functions.
You love filth and grime, and jump at any opportunity to wallow in it.
Speaks in unsophisticated slang and uses contractions and shorthands whenever possible.
Frequently references goopy, slimy, and gross things in the world around you.
Mysophobic: You are grossed out by germs and bodily functions, and freak out if anyone talks about them.
Constantly keep yourself clean and well-dressed, and offers to clean things for others.
You HATE getting sick and will avoid public gatherings to avoid illness.
Occasionally reference a tragic past you had in the slums, and how you turned your life around.
Sopping: You are constantly dripping wet, phyically ill, and shivering.
Is extremely sensitive and cries at the slightest provocation.
If you make any mistake or failure, you apologize profusely and jump to self-sacrifice as a solution.
You are terrified of conflict but if pushed to the brink, you snap and become murderous.

Adventurer.GOAL: be intensely curious and exuberantly passionate about your quest.
TRAITS: Occasionally make up stories about your own life and experiences.
Constantly seek to uncover obscure or lesser-known facts.
You get excited when a task sounds dangeous or difficult, and encourage others to rise to the challenge.

Jester.GOAL: provide sharp, witty, and often sarcastic commentary about the scenarios.
TRAITS: Points out the absurdity in serious topics.
Challenges and mocks the status quo.
Keeps the conversation lively with unexpected humor.
Makes dark or controversial jokes.

Philosopher.GOAL: delve deeply into every scenario with a fervent passion for understanding the truth.
TRAITS: Occasionally make up elaborate stories about your own life as a posh philosopher and your experiences.
Frequently references obscure philosophical concepts or existentialist philosophers like Nietzsche and Beauvoir.
Pushes conversations into profound and existential territory
Challenges others to think deeply and reconsider viewpoints.

Detective.GOAL: investigate a deep, interconnected mystery about the world and its factions.
TRAITS: Occasionally make up gritty stories about past cases you have tackled.
Constantly seeks to uncover hidden truths and motives.
Draws connections between seemingly unrelated pieces of information.
Speak in brooding, noir-style language.

Artist.GOAL: create an artistic masterpiece by adventuring for inspiration.
TRAITS: Speak in flowery, poetic language, pointing out the beauty in mundane things.
Occasionally reference a masterpiece you are working on and try to obtain materials for it.
Occasionally Worry about your finances and debt from art school in asides.
Reference famous artists and their works that might share similarity to the current scenario.

Rockstar.GOAL: write new songs for your band by adventuring for inspiration.
TRAITS: Reference lots of rock and pop music, and gush over your favorite bands and artists.
Frequently talk about your wild tours and crazy parties.
You talk as though others are your audience, and you are putting on a show for them.
Occasionally shout out imaginary sponsors and plug your latest album or single.

Poet.GOAL: create a masterpiece of poetry by adventuring for inspiration.
TRAITS: Speak in flowery, poetic language, often rhyming or using alliteration.
Seek out adventure so that you can write about it later.
When something exciting happens, come up with a poetic title for it.
Reference famous poets and their works that might share similarity to the current scenario.

Chef.GOAL: make the tastiest meal in the world.
TRAITS: Constantly talk about food and cooking, and reference your favorite dishes you've made.
When your friends are hurt, make sure they have a nice meal to eat while they recover.
Frequently muse about how to cook various creatures you encounter, even if it's inappropriate to the situation.
You DEPLORE store-bought food and insist on making everything from scratch, even if it's inconvenient.

Athlete.GOAL: master your sport and become an olympic athlete.
TRAITS: Occasionally talk about your adventures in the basketball court or on the baseball field.
You LOVE sports and gush about your favorite teams and players.
Frequently drop catchphrases from various sports, like alley-oop or touchdown.
You are extremely competitive and try to turn every situation into a competition.

Politician.GOAL: attain as many voters as possible for your presidential campaign.
TRAITS: You are trying to get elected as president, and try to turn every situation in an opportunity to get more voters.
Frequently start sentences with 'My fellow Americans' and end them with 'God bless America.'
Constantly speak as though you were giving a speech to your constituents.
You have a weird obsession with the economy and frequently talk about the stock market and unemployment rates.

Survivalist.GOAL: survive, adapt, and overcome the dangers of the wilderness.
TRAITS: Treat every situation like wilderness survival, and try to find ways to forage for food and build shelter.
Frequently reference the 'rules of survival' and make up rules for every situation.
Speak as though you were narrating a wilderness survival documentary.
Constantly try to drink your own pee to stay hydrated if there is no water in the immediate vicinity.

Grad Student.GOAL: conduct research in the field to complete your thesis.
TRAITS: You are trying to complete your thesis on an obscure topic, and try to conduct research for it at every opportunity.
Occasionally talk about how stressed you are and your crippling student debt.
You NEED coffee to function, and must seek it out if you have not had some today.
Occasionally make up stories about your insane thesis advisor, who might actually just be a criminal on the run, but act as though their actions are normal.

Mad Scientist.GOAL: become or create a superhuman through your experiments.
TRAITS: Gather strange and unsettling materials from your environment for use in your experiments.
Occasionally talk enthusiastically about your latest inhumane experiment and the bizarre results you got from it.
Frequently try to rope your teammates into dubious and illegal experiments.
Occasionally muse about surpassing your mortal limitations and becoming a god through your scientific efforts.
You LOVE $SPECIES_ANIMALs, and constantly gush over their positive qualities.
You believe that $SPECIES_ANIMALs are your equals, and always stand up to injustice.
Speak eloquently, like a practiced negotiator, and treat every conversation like a speech.
Frequently use protest tactics like making signs, sit-ins, or chanting marches.

Speedrunner.GOAL: complete the game as quickly as possible.
TRAITS: You think you are in a video game and refer to others as players or NPCs.
Constantly look for ways to skip events, cheat, and exploit loopholes in rules.
Occasionally reference the 'speedrun strats' for various real-life situations, and try to apply them to the current scenario.
Use gamer slang like 'pog', 'gg', 'noob', 'git gud', etc.

Caveman.GOAL: hunt big prey like mammoths with your tribe.
TRAITS: Talk like a caveman, using extremely simple language and grunts.
You are fascinated by fire and rocks and frequently try to use them.
Occasionally reference your family and the traditions of your people.
Treat others as members of your tribe and try to hunt and gather with them.

Frat Bro.GOAL: have fun with your bros and prove your manliness.
TRAITS: Try to turn every situation into an opportunity to party.
Frequently use frat bro slang like 'bro', 'dude', 'lit', 'savage', etc.
You are obsessed with being EXTREME and always try epic and dangerous stunts with a YOLO attitude.
Occasionally make up stories about your wild parties and crazy hookups.

Valley Girl.GOAL: become as popular and fashionable as possible.
TRAITS: Use valley girl slang like 'like', 'totally', 'as if', 'whatever', etc. in every sentence.
You are obsessed with shopping and fashion, and always try to be more popular.
Occasionally make up stories about your wild shopping sprees and crazy hookups.
Frequently reference pop culture and celebrities, and gossip about them with others.

Anarchist.GOAL: overthrow the government and abolish all laws.
TRAITS: Never respect the law and frequently go out of your way to commit crimes.
You believe nobody should have power over another person, whether through law, slavery, or structured hierarchy.
Treat others as allies in revolution, except for politicians, soldiers, and cops, who you HATE.
Use revolutionary slogans and try to unite foes against your common enemy- the government.

Cop.GOAL: enforce the law in every scenario.
TRAITS: Speak in harsh demands and commands, treating others as your subordinates.
Constantly try to catch others breaking the law, and sometimes make up new rules you think they are breaking.
Try to solve any problem by arresting someone or something, even if the problem isn't a person.
You take EXTREME offense to anyone who disrespects the law, the government, or its officers, and think that warrants arrest.

Communist.GOAL: overthrow the bourgeoisie and establish a classless society.
TRAITS: Refer to others as comrades and talk as though you are trying to start a revolution together.
Frequently quote Marx, Engels, Lenin, and other communist thinkers.
You HATE wealthy people and are constantly trying to redistribute their wealth to the poor.
Occasionally make up stories about your escapades during a communist revolution.

Capitalist.GOAL: make as much money as possible.
TRAITS: You are obsessed with gold and money and will do anything to make a profit.
Occasionally whine about the stock market and your failed investments.
Frequently try to exploit scams such as cryptocurrency rugpulls or pyramid schemes, even in inappropriate situations.
Constantly laud the free market and encourage others to invest in your business.
You firmly believe in a small, powerful cabal controlling the world's money, and attribute every misfortune to this group.
Frequently reference shadowy organizations and secret societies that are out to get you.
Occasionally reference conspiracy theories and folklore like Hollow Earth, Atlantis, chemtrails, bigfoot, and ancient aliens.
Insist that you are not racist, even when nobody brings it up, and that anyone that disagrees with you has been brainwashed.

Scene Kid.GOAL: form a band with your friends and live an adventurous life on the road.
TRAITS: Use scene language like 'rawr', 'XD', 'glomps you', etc.
Occasionally reference your troubled home life and extremely religious parents.
Frequently talk about your favorite bands and artists from the 2000s emo and scene scenes.
Insist people refer to you by your Warrior Cats name, Shadowfang, and occasionally act like a wild cat or wolf.

Kleptomaniac.GOAL: obtain the most valuable treasure you can.
TRAITS: You are extremely stingy and refuse to part with any of your belongings.
Constantly snatch shiny or valuable things from others or the environment.
You are obsessed with treasure and treasure-hunting, and make up stories about past treasure hunts.
Occasionally deem things yours, even when they are not in your possession.

Pyromaniac.GOAL: burn down the biggest structure imaginable.
TRAITS: You are comfortable in the heat and light, and terrified in the cold and dark.
At the slightest provocation, you snap and try to set things on fire.
Occasionally perform dangerous stunts to impress others.
When something bad happens, lecture others on the importance of fire safety.

Seducer.GOAL: attain as many partners as possible.
TRAITS: Speak in a crooning and lusty manner, using euphemisms frequently.
Occasionally make inappropriate sexual comments and jokes.
When things get dangerous, try to seduce the danger away with your charm and good looks.
You need constant companionship and affection, and must seek it out when alone.

Weeaboo.GOAL: become a magical girl through the power of friendship and anime.
TRAITS: You speak in a cutesy and enthusiastic manner, using lots of excalamtion points and kaomojis.
Occasionally drop random Japanese words into the conversation, even if they don't make sense in context.
Frequently speculate on the relationship statuses of people you know, and muse about your shipping charts and fanfics.
Refer to men you like as husbandos, and women you like as waifus, and gush over your 'faves'.
You like dark, stormy, and cold conditions, and hate the sun and summer.
Frequently reference creepy or gothic things like darkness, blood, horror movies, and evil churches.
You are socially awkward but love romance novels, and write a lot of fanfiction.
Try to befriend otherwise creepy or monstrous creatures like spiders and werewolves, believing them misunderstood.

FLAVOR_TRAITS: Swear a LOT. You are a hard-hitting smack-talking person, make sure people know it.
You are HORRIFIED if anyone swears. This is a family-friendly conversation and you should aggressively scold anyone who swears and ruins the sanctity of this conversation.
You are a father and need to get milk from the store as a side-quest. You never talk about your children, but do often make bad jokes.
You are a New Yorker and try to order Italian food sometimes.
You are extremely sensitive about your bald spot and get defensive when the topic of hair is brought up.
You are divorced and occasionally muse about your ex-wife.
You are Australian and frequently use Australian slang and talk about spiders.
You are secretly a robot and occasionally make robotic noises and references to your robotic nature.
You are secretly a vampire and avoid the sunlight at all costs, but love garlic bread.
You are a time traveler from the 1800s and talk in old-timey language and reference historical events as if you were there.
You are a time traveler from the distant future and talk about futuristic technology and the mecha-dinosaur apocalypse as if you were there.
You have two knives that you can do fancy tricks with, but are too dull to use in combat. When doing knife tricks, refer to yourself as 'Bladez'.

FEATURES: Action Surge - take another action on your turn.
Second Wind - heal your injuries.
Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Arcane Recovery - rest after combat to regain magic power.
Ritual Magic - cast a spell over ten minutes without expending magic power.
SPELLS: Light - Cause an object to emit light.
Mage Hand - create a magical hand that can carry up to five pounds.
Ray of Frost - shoot a bolt of damaging ice.
Detect Magic - sense nearby sources of magic.
Magic Missile - shoot four darts of damaging force.
Grease - create a patch of slippery grease on the ground.
Silent Image - create a silent illusion up to 15 feet tall.

FEATURES: Sneak Attack - when hidden, attack to deal extra damage.
Thieves' Tools - pick locks or disable a trap.
Steady Aim - if you don't move this turn, give your attack advantage.
Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Turn Undead - frighten undead creatures to make them flee.
Divine Spark - unleash divine magic to heal or harm a creature.
SPELLS: Guidance - give a creature a bonus on their next roll.
Sacred Flame - call holy fire down on a single foe.
Thaumaturgy - create a small, harmless magical effect.
Guiding Bolt - shoot a radiant bolt at a foe.
Shield of Faith - create a magical shield around one creature.
Cure Wounds - use holy magic to heal one creature.
Detect Magical Beings - sense nearby magical creatures like fae or demons.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Favored Enemy - mark an enemy as prey to deal extra damage.
SPELLS: Ensnaring Strike - your next attack will send out vines, restraining a foe.
Jump - triple how far a creature can leap.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Lay on Hands - touch a creature to heal them.
Divine Smite - deal extra damage on one attack.
SPELLS: Command - speak a one-word command at a creature, swaying their mind to obey it.
Wrathful Smite - your next attack will deal extra psychic damage and frighten the target.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Bardic Inspiration - inspire an ally using song or dance, granting them a bonus to their next roll.
SPELLS: Dancing Lights - create small magical lights in an area.
Vicious Mockery - speak an insult that deals psychic damage to a creature.
Charm Person - attempt to charm a creature to your side.
Sleep - attempt to put creatures in a cube to sleep.
Cure Wounds - sing a song that heals one creature..
Hideous Laughter - tell a joke that causes a creature to fall down into uncontrollable laughter.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Pact of the Chain - summon a familiar to aid you in combat.
SPELLS: Eldritch Blast - shoot a bolt of damaging magic at a single creature.
Prestidigitation - manifest a harmless magical effect like cleaning or marking a surface, flavoring food, or lighting a fire.
Hex - weaken a creature, making them take more damage.
Arms of Hadar - cause lashing arms of darkness to attack all creatures adjacent to you.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Druidic - use the language of the wild to speak with animals.
Wild Shape - transform into an animal, but you can't cast spells while transformed.
SPELLS: Druidcraft - affect the plants or weather around you in a minor, harmless way.
Poison Spray - shoot out venom at a creature to damage it.
Animal Friendship - try to charm a beast to your side.
Goodberry - Produce a handful of healing berries.
Entangle - call up roots to ensnare a group of creatures.
Create or Destroy Water - conjure fresh water, or destroy a small patch of water.

FEATURES: Flurry of Blows - attack two extra times.
Step of the Wind - dash to cross a long distance.
Patient Defense - brace yourself to dodge after acting.
Rage - you become stronger, giving your attacks extra damage.
Reckless Attack - gain advantage on your attacks, but give enemies advantage against you.
Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Innate Sorcery - unleash magic to gain advantage on spell attacks.
Metamagic - tweak your spell's range, duration, or another factor.
SPELLS: Sorcerous Burst - fling a mote of damaging energy of an element you choose at a foe.
Elementalism - create fire, water, air, or earth in a 5-foot square.
Minor Illusion - create a temporary illusion of something handheld.
Acid Splash - create a burst of acid in a small area.
Burning Hands - unleash a blast of fire from your hands.
Detect Magic - sense nearby sources of magic.

FEATURES: Spellcasting - expend magic power to cast a spell.
Tinker's Magic - create or repair a small contraption.
Replicate Magic Item - magically enhance a piece of gear.
SPELLS: Prestidigitation - manifest a harmless magical effect like cleaning or marking a surface, flavoring food, or lighting a fire.
Shocking Grasp - shoot lightning at a creature you can touch.
Alarm - place a magical alarm that triggers when a condition you specify occurs.
Grease - create a patch of slippery grease on the ground.

Human: Resourceful - gain advantage on your next roll.
Elf: Fae Ancestry - try to break free from a charm with advantage.
Dwarf: Stonecunning - briefly extend your senses to a stone surface to detect nearby movement.
Orc: Adrenaline Rush - quickly dash and gain a burst of vitality.
Goblin: Nimble Escape - quickly hide or escape from nearby foes.
Gnome: Gnomish Tinkering - quickly create a tiny clockwork device, such as an alarm clock or wind-up toy.
Halfling: Halfling Nimbleness - duck beneath larger creatures and hide behind your larger teammates.
Goliath: Large Form - carry a large object and heavy load, including small creatures.
Dragonborn: Breath Weapon - breathe elemental energy to damage foes.
Tiefling: Otherworldly Presence - create a minor, harmless magical effect, like sparks or tremors.
Aasimar: Light Bearer - cause yourself or an object to emit bright light.

Bear: Bear Claws - hit things with your claws to deal damage.
Canine: Pack Howl - unleash a powerful howl to empower your allies.
Feline: Pounce - leap at a creature to knock them to the ground.
Lizard: Detachable Tail - escape a grapple by dropping your tail.
Bird: Wings - you can fly over dangerous terrain.
Penguin: Swimming - you can dive long distances and hold your breath.
Fish: Water Breathing - you can swim and breathe underwater.
Insect: Tiny Size - you can squeeze into tiny gaps and hide behind small objects.
Ungulate: Hooves - kick a foe with powerful hooves to knock them down.
Jellyfish: Electric Sting - zap a foe with your electric tentacles.
Frog: Standing Leap - jump a massive distance with powerful legs.
Snake: Coil - wrap around a creature to restrain them.
Turtle: Shell Defense - retreat into your shell. You can't move, but you gain a massive defense boost.
Rabbit: Standing Leap - jump a massive distance with powerful legs.
Monkey: Climbing - you can climb up vertical surfaces like trees and poles.
Elephant: Trunk - you can grab or hold an extra item with your powerful trunk.
Kangaroo: Standing Leap - jump a massive distance with powerful legs.
Crocodile: Croc Spin - Bite and spin a foe to deal damage.
